bike.description: OCLV Mountain Carbon main frame, alloy stays, Carbon Armor, ABP Convert, Full Floater, E2 tapered head tube, magnesium EVO Link, oversized pivot bearings, replaceable derailleur hanger, 150mm travel

components.description: DT Swiss M 1800, 32 hole, 15mm front hub, 142x12mm rear hub; tubeless compatible
Bontrager Race Lite Low Riser, 31.8mm, 25mm rise, 9 degree sweep
FSA NO.57E, E2, ACB sealed bearings
Avid Elixir R hydraulic disc brakes
Trek fork and shock sag meter, ABP Convert hardware for 135x5mm QR, Bontrager shock pump
